item.title: The many looks of Cher
item.description: Throughout her career, Cher has always been known for her flamboyant fashion.
item.ExtractedText: The many looks of Cher Updated 1312 GMT (2112 HKT) May 20, 2016 21 photos: The many looks of Cher Cher takes a promotional photo for "The Sonny and Cher Comedy Hour" in 1972. See more photos of the iconic singer and actress, who turns 70 years old on Friday, May 20. Hide Caption 1 of 21 21 photos: The many looks of Cher Cher, who was born Cherilyn Sarkisian in 1946, became a household name in the 1960s. She and her husband, Sonny Bono, had a No. 1 song with "I Got You, Babe." The two divorced in 1975 but would still work together on television. Hide Caption 2 of 21 21 photos: The many looks of Cher Throughout her career, Cher has always been known for her flamboyant fashion. Here, she wears a feathered headdress for "The Sonny and Cher Comedy Hour" in 1972. Hide Caption 21 photos: The many looks of Cher Cher wears an Asian-styled headdress and a sleeveless satin top for her show in 1972. Hide Caption 21 photos: The many looks of Cher Cher sings in a cloud of fog during her show in 1972. Hide Caption 5 of 21 21 photos: The many looks of Cher In 1974, Cher performs as ringmaster on the opening day of the Ringling Bros. Circus in Inglewood, California. Hide Caption 21 photos: The many looks of Cher Cher, in character for her show, tours Liberace's mansion in 1974. Hide Caption 7 of 21 21 photos: The many looks of Cher During her career, Cher has won an Academy Award, a Grammy Award and an Emmy Award. Hide Caption 21 photos: The many looks of Cher Cher models Bob Mackie fashion in 1978. Hide Caption 21 photos: The many looks of Cher Cher wears another Bob Mackie creation in 1978. Hide Caption 21 photos: The many looks of Cher Cher poses for the cover of her album "Prisoner" in 1979. Hide Caption 21 photos: The many looks of Cher Cher poses during a photo shoot in 1984. Hide Caption 12 of 21 21 photos: The many looks of Cher Between 1965 and 1999, Cher had five No. 1 hits -- four as a solo artist and one with Sonny Bono. Hide Caption 13 of 21 21 photos: The many looks of Cher Cher attends the Academy Awards in 1986. In 1988, she won the best actress Oscar for her role in "Moonstruck." Other films she has starred in include "Mask," "Silkwood" and "The Witches of Eastwick." Hide Caption 21 photos: The many looks of Cher Cher poses with actor Bob Hoskins to promote their 1990 film "Mermaids." Hide Caption 15 of 21 21 photos: The many looks of Cher Cher and her son Elijah Blue Allman attend the Academy Awards together in 1998. Allman is the son of musician Gregg Allman, who Cher was married to from 1975-1979. Cher also has a son, Chaz, from her marriage to Sonny Bono. Hide Caption 16 of 21 21 photos: The many looks of Cher At the turn of the century, Cher's "Believe" won a Grammy Award for best dance recording. Hide Caption 21 photos: The many looks of Cher Cher performs in 2005 during "Living Proof: The Farewell Tour." Hide Caption 21 photos: The many looks of Cher Cher speaks on stage at the 2010 MTV Video Music Awards. Hide Caption 21 photos: The many looks of Cher Cher performs during her "Dressed To Kill Tour" in 2014. Hide Caption 21 photos: The many looks of Cher Cher attends the Met Gala in New York in 2015. Hide Caption
